ai-tha-ap89:1.1_0: “The Himalayas are falling from the Himalayas,
ai-tha-ap89:2.1_0: I gave the gift of a fruit
ai-tha-ap89:3.1_0: On the two occasions when the other goes forth
ai-tha-ap89:3.2_0: to which the income is fruitless,
ai-tha-ap89:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap89:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Soṇa.
ai-tha-ap89:6.1_0: he saw the seventh Elder Nuns’ fruition.
